cells.data:
-- Lift a simple function to one which applies to a tuple, 
-- transforming only the first item of the tuple

-- firstArrow :: (a -> b) -> ((a, c) -> (b, c))
on firstArrow(f)
    script
        on |λ|(xy)
            Tuple(mReturn(f)'s |λ|(|1| of xy), |2| of xy)
        end |λ|
    end script
end |first|
